Dua Santri Ponpes Banyuanyar Pamekasan Raih Juara I di MTQ Jatim 2019
04 Nov 2019, 11:14 by Iswantoro


Dua Santri Ponpes Banyuanyar Pamekasan Raih Juara I di MTQ Jatim 2019

KBRN, Pamekasan : Dua santri Pondok Pesantren Banyuanyar Kabupaten Pamekasan berhasil meraih prestasi dalam ajang Musabaqah Tilawatil Quran (MTQ) ke – 28 Provinsi Jawa Timur tahun 2019 di Kabupaten Tuban.
 Mereka adalah Dody Adrian Febriansyah siswa SMA Tahfidz Darul Ulum Pondok Pesantren Banyunyar yang berhasil meraih juara 1 kategori Tahfidz 30 Juz dan Zainal Abidin Mahasiswa Sekolah Tinggi Ilmu Bahasa Arab (STIBA) Darul Ulum Pondok Pesantren Banyunyar yang meraih juara 1 kategori Tafsir Bahasa Arab 30 Juz.
Kepala Sekolah SMA Tahfidz Darul Ulum Pondok Pesantren Banyunyar Khofif melalui Waka Bidang Kurikulum Hendri Masduki menyatakan,  diraihnya juara 1 oleh dua santri itu adalah suatu kebanggaan tersendiri bagi pihak pengelola Ponpes Banyuanyar, karena ini bagian dari dampak sosial  dari pelaksanaan pembelajaran dengan pola pengembangan kurikulum berbasis Al-Qur’an berwawasan Pondok Pesantren.
Selain itu menurut Hendri,  prestasi ini tidak terlepas dari adanya program intensif yang dilakukan oleh Markaz Dirasat Qur’aniyah (MDQ) Darul Ulum Ponpes Banyunyar sebagai mitra SMA Tahfidz Darul Ulum dalam hal pembinaan Tahassus Al-Qur’an.
“Kami atas nama pengelola mengucapkan terima kasih yang setinggi-tingginya kepada semua pihak khususnya kepada para pembina pada Markaz Dirasat Qur’aniyah (MDQ) Darul Ulum Pondok Pesantren Banyunyar Pamekasan yang telah maksimal membimbing siswa kami, sehingga menjadi generasi Qur’ani dalam meraih prestasi gemilang, sebagai upaya menjaga marwah Islam,” ungkapnya, Senin (4/11/2019). 
Sementara itu Direktur  MDQ Darul Ulum Ponpes Banyunyar Mahmud Ayatullah mengatakan,  dirinya sangat bersyukur  karena dari binaan MDQ  tidak hanya mempunyai kemampuan menghafal Al-Qur’an, namun di sisi lain juga mempunyai kemampuan dibidang Tafsir Al-Qur’an dengan menggunakan Bahasa Arab.

Two Santri Ponpes Banyuanyar Pamekasan Wins First Place in MTQ East Java 2019
Nov 04 2019, 11:14 by Iswantoro


Two Santri Ponpes Banyuanyar Pamekasan Wins First Place in MTQ East Java 2019

KBRN, Pamekasan: Two students of the Banyuanyar Islamic Boarding School in Pamekasan Regency succeeded in achieving the 28th Musabaqah Tilawatil Quran (MTQ) event in East Java Province in 2019 in Tuban Regency.
They are Dody Adrian Febriansyah Tahfidz Darul Ulum High School student at Banyunyar Islamic Boarding School who won 1st place in the 30 Juz Tahfidz category and Zainal Abidin Arabic Language School (STIBA) Darul Ulum Islamic Boarding School student at Banyunyar Boarding School which won 1st place in the 30 Juz Arabic Language Interpretation category.
Headmaster of Tahfidz High School Darul Ulum Banyunyar Khofif Islamic Boarding School through Waka Curriculum Field Hendri Masduki stated, the achievement of first place by the two students was a matter of pride for the management of the Banyuanyar Islamic Boarding School, because this was part of the social impact of implementing learning with Al-based curriculum development patterns. -Qur'an insight Islamic boarding school.
In addition, according to Hendri, this achievement is inseparable from the intensive program carried out by Markaz Dirasat Qur'aniyah (MDQ) Darul Ulum Banyunyar Islamic Boarding School as a partner of Tahfidz Darul Ulum High School in terms of fostering Tahassus Al-Qur'an.
"On behalf of the manager, we would like to express our highest gratitude to all parties, especially to the mentors of the Darul Ulum Markaz Dirasat Qur'aniyah, Darul Ulum, the Banyunyar Islamic Boarding School Pamekasan who has maximally guided our students, so that they can become the Qur'ani generation in achieving achievements. brilliant, as an effort to maintain the spirit of Islam, "he said, Monday (11/04/2019).
Meanwhile, MDQ Director Darul Ulum Ponpes Banyunyar Mahmud Ayatullah said, he was very grateful because from the MDQ fostered not only has the ability to memorize the Qur'an, but on the other hand also has the ability in the field of Al-Qur'an Interpretation using Arabic.
